summary: This mod replaces the original Penitus Oculatus Armor by my very own interpretation of the emperors personal guard - the praetorian guard armor.
descriptionHtml:
Penitus Oculatus Praetorian by JackoO

version 1.1 

----------
This mod replaces the original Penitus Oculatus Armor by my very own interpretation of the emperors personal guard - the praetorian guard armor.
It does NOT change any armor value - so no balancing problems should appear. 

There are (and never will be) helmet meshes for the beast races. Im not playing beast race so i will not mod them. Please dont ask for that.



Install
--------------------
Copy the \"data\" to your personal skyrim game folder.
Start the skyrim launcher, check the JoOPraetorian.esp and start game


Uninstall
--------------------
uncheck JoOPraetorian.esp in skyrim launcher
delete the .esp file and the following:

meshes\\\\armor\\\\JoO
textures\\\\clothes\\\\JoO



Credits
--------------------
Thanks to Bethesda for creating skyrim and the Creation kit!
Thanks to cgtextures.com
\"One or more textures on this 3D-model have been created with images from CGTextures.com. These images may not be redistributed by default. Please visit www.cgtextures.com for more information\"
Thanks to skyrimnexus
Thanks to all creators of blender
Thanks to all creators of niftools



Licensing
--------------------
Please contact me, if you want to use, or change any part of the mod but at least give me credit for the work. (Youre welcome to use it in your very own mod - but please contact me)

For all objects modified with base skyrim resources: all rights reserved to bethesda softworks

--------------------

I take no responsibility for any harm to your computer or your personal life that occured by using these files
author: JackoO
